intro: Stilpnophytum inopinatum, commonly known as the desert star. It is a flowering plant native to the arid regions of southern Africa. The plant is characterized by its striking yellow flowers and succulent, fleshy leaves adapted to store water. It belongs to the family Aizoaceae, which includes many species adapted to dry environments. Stilpnophytum inopinatum is often found in rocky soils and is well-suited for xerophytic conditions.
